recommendations: Aharon Yosef Baer
Business Relationship Specialist at Optum
December 16, 2016, Aharon Yosef was a client of Mindy’s

I had the pleasure of working with Mindy when I was seeking a job with Ipro Tech. Although I was not chosen for the position, Mindy took the time to communicate with me, encourage me, and offer guidance. She said I was a strong candidate, asked if she could keep my resume for future opportunities. Many recruiters say that, but Mindy meant it. A few weeks later she called me to ask if she could share my resume with a friend from a different company who was looking to hire someone with my skills. Next thing I know, I have an interview with another company based on her recommendation.Working with Mindy was the best job seeking experience I have ever had. That is saying a lot considering I was not even offered the job.

September 25, 2014, Mindy reported directly to Tina

I had the privilege of working directly for Tina over the past six months at Ipro Tech.   During this time, she helped me grow and she was a great mentor.  Tina encouraged me to work on my skills and was very supportive.  In addition, she did a great job managing all aspects of the HR function for this growing organization.  Tina supported teams throughout the organization, helped foster the company culture and ensure Ipro was a place that top talent desired to work.  Tina has a passion to help people and go above and beyond to get the job done.  Tina is trustworthy, positive and fantastic at building relationships.  I truly enjoyed working with and for Tina.

summary: “Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.” - Albert Schweitzer Current positions (these are ALL direct hire/permanent positions):-Digital Marketing Specialist- located in Chandler AZ-Senior IP Engineer- located in Phoenix- must have experience with Telecom or MSO industry and experience with Cisco/Juniper, optical transport and Sr. network engineering skills.-Mid level to Sr. C# .NET Engineers- across the valley. This is my specialty so if you are looking please contact me and I will help you find a good place to call home.Contact Mindy for more details about position, location and compensation etc..***If you are an employer looking for highly skilled, talented professionals or you are looking for a new position, please feel free to contact me at 480.229.5885 or Mindy at mindy@mindsparkrecruiting.com.***  I have been recruiting for the past 7 years. I enjoy getting to know the candidates that I am working with and what their "true passion" really is. My true passion is helping people by presenting them great opportunities that will help them with their career and long term goals. My specialties include IT/ Development, E-commerce and E-discovery.
name: Mindy (Metcalf) Honigmann
